about_the_game:
RISE OF DEADS; is a journey of a girl seeking for life to survive in a world that After six months of spreading a virus the entire world collapsed only few communities remained where all fights for live which every resource matters , the player will go through this epic journey with full of adventure and puzzles to be solved.

SKILL TREE



Character customization and advancement are mostly dependent on player skills and skill trees. Players usually collect skill points as they go through the game, which they can use to unlock and improve certain attributes and abilities.
Players can customize their characters using the skill tree system to suit their preferred playstyles, whether that be emphasizing stealth, fighting prowess, or a combination of talents. The way a player approaches difficulties and confrontations can be greatly altered by the various powers, passive bonuses, and specialized tactics they unlock as they invest points into the skill tree.
Players are frequently faced with important decisions because to the branching layout of skill trees, which force them to choose which abilities.

CRAFTING SYSTEM

player craft items that allows players to customize and enhance their gameplay experience. These items, often obtained through crafting or looting, enable players to create unique weapons, tools, goods.that can give them an edge in combat, exploration, or resource gathering.
The process of crafting player items typically involves gathering various materials, specific recipes to produce the desired item.
Player-crafted items can have a significant impact on a game play progression, as they can provide powerful stat boosts, . Collecting rare materials, learning advanced crafting recipes, and optimizing item builds is essential strategies for player.

content_descriptors.notes: Players defend themselves from the zombies and other human survivors by using a variety of weapons in addition to melee attacks with bats, axes, and knives. In addition, covert combat with a close-up camera view and themes of torture and suicide are available to players.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6600 or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 1650 or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit (latest update) or Windows® 11 64 Bit (latest update)
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I7-8700K or AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 5600XT or Intel® Arc™ A770
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
